page.text: You fall and sprawl out in front of the grinning rat girl. She happily squeaks and right away flops on top of your head. You can feel her soft, warm buttocks wiggle and rub against you, slowly spreading wider apart. The ratgirl is smaller than you, so attempts to stuff you inside will be just silly, but that doesn't stop her and you can feel how the tight pucker slowly stretches wider and wider, until suddenly it rolls all over your head. The greedy girl squeaks out and moans with pleasure, now sitting on your shoulders.

Her insides are hot and really tight for you, especially as the girl leads your hands in between of her buttocks. Barely sheâ€™ll fit more, but still you can feel new pressure forcing your shoulders to slide in. Your face is easily visible on her tummy as the rat girl continues squirming around and tugging at the large prey. Her slimy bowels slowly stretch to fit more of your body, forcing you to curl through the fleshy tunnels.

You can only move your legs as the greedy rodent packs all of your torso inside, going to slow down and relax. After all bigger part of her prey is already tucked in tight and not going to leave any time soon. You can feel her tail poke and tickle at your feet, making you struggle more as she teasingly slow pushes your legs into herself. The thick, long outline of your body continues moving in her abdomen, filling more and more of the bowels, until finally the rat manages to shove even your toes into herself.

The ratgirl squeeks in distress as sooner after disappearing inside you recover your second wind and shove your way back out. She squirms helplessly on the ground as you extricate yourself, worming back out until you finally pop free a bit smellier and a whole lot less dignified.

Impossibly, you can't escape her rear. Clenched inside the rodentgirl's tight innards you cannot escape her little body, barely able to move you're forced to suffer the indignities of digestions as her body gets to work on making you hers. Enzymic slime coating your skin as she rolls forwards onto her massive belly, your shape well defined and outlined in her globular gut as you stretch it so greatly with your larger form. And she settles in to digest.

gameover.text: The ratgirl can't move, but doesn't let that bother her. Dozing off resting atop her gut as the hours begin to tick by, that mass turning rounder underneath her as she digests away your body. Still more time passes and her pillow belly full of softening glop is now shrinking down. Some twelve hours later her middle shrinks down to nothing but a lingering layer of pudge as she rests now on the ground again. The chubbier ratgirl waking up and letting out a delighted squeek as she feels over herself, your profound indignity has been a profound gain for the rodent.

page.text: You can barely move in the tight innards of the rodent and can hear her enzymes gurgle around you. The rat letting out pleased squeeks and murs as she shes over the only parts of her massive belly she can reach, she must be adorable. and it's too much bother to try and escape, you settle in to be food for the little rodent..closing your eyes as her insides start to ooze more digestive slime over your body and starts to break you down.
